name: ULTRASPACE
description:
UltraSpace is a retro-styled space shooter arcade where you have to destroy everything on your way!

Let me know what's your hi-score in comments!
Any bug/recommendation please tell me!

Controls:
Move = Arrows
Shoot = Spacebar
Pause/Exit = Esc


Thanks to my friend Lic Eir for helping me with the music <3
Thanks for playing!
